= Go Bible Project =

Go Bible consists of two core components:

  * GoBibleCore - Engine that runs on mobile phones.
  * GoBibleCreator - Tool for combining Bible texts and GoBibleCore into a phone application.

The Go Bible source code has been placed in the public domain. Read more about the GoBibleLicense.
